reviews.content: When quarantine hit, I decided to put all of my effort into working on myself; mentally and physically. Mirror is a great tool for both. I got stronger, lost weight, and found emotional motivation to keep going. My whole life changed.
I've never been an athletic person so The Mirror is helping me learn about movement, how to use my body, how to become an athlete, and how to stay consistent.
I love to try new classes without an audience!  I can truly dance like no ones watching.

So I Got my mirror Beginning of May 2021 and Im so addicted. A year ago at 40 I had a pacemaker implanted and getting back active had been tough and a long recovery BUT here I am over 50 workouts in and totally loving it!
It is so nice to have The Mirror at home so I can sneak in a workout while watching my little one. Truly nothing can beat the convenience.
The Mirror has been a definite game changer for my home workouts. The variety of class options and difficulty levels leaves no room for excuses, which is perfect for a busy mom like myself.
The accomplishment  you feel when completing a class and the community really gives me that push and encouragement to show up every day.
